title: How to Get Leafeon on Pokémon Diamond, Pearl, or Platinum

steps.title: Go deep into the forest until you see a huge mossy rock.
steps.content: Go deep into the forest until you see a huge mossy rock.

steps.title: Get your Eevee out and run around in the tall grass near the mossy rock.
steps.content: Get your Eevee out and run around in the tall grass near the mossy rock.

steps.title: If Eevee has a victory in the battle without fainting, Eevee will evolve to Leafeon.
steps.content: If Eevee has a victory in the battle without fainting, Eevee will evolve to Leafeon.

steps.title: Leafeon's stats and features are :
steps.content: Leafeon's stats and features are : Leafeon's highest stats are Attack and Defense and the lowest stats are HP (Hit Points) and Special Defense. Leafeon is the Grass type Pokémon and Leafeon's' weaknesses are Bug, Flying, Fire, Ice, and Poison. Leafeon can be both a boy or girl. Leafeon's ability is Leaf Guard.
